summary: This is an email from reporter Jeff Ostrowski to an unspecified recipient, querying about the government's plans regarding the forfeiture of Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach property in light of his indictment. The reporter notes the indictment mentions forfeiture of 'any property' but does not specifically list the El Brillo Way address.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the indictment and potential property forfeiture being inquired about by the reporter.

persons.name: Jeff Ostrowski
persons.context: The author of the email, a reporter for The Palm Beach Post and Palm Beach Daily News, seeking clarification on the property forfeiture aspect of the Epstein indictment.

events.title: Reporter Inquiry on Property Forfeiture
events.description: Reporter Jeff Ostrowski sends an email query regarding the government's plans to pursue forfeiture of Jeffrey Epstein's Palm Beach property following his indictment.

keyFacts: The document is a reporter's email query dated July 9, 2019, regarding Jeffrey Epstein's indictment.
The reporter is seeking clarification on whether the government plans to pursue forfeiture of Epstein's Palm Beach property, specifically the El Brillo Way real estate.
The reporter notes a discrepancy between the indictment's mention of forfeiture of 'any property' and the lack of a specific address or legal description for the El Brillo Way property.
